agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: County Affairs TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Thursday, May 9, 2019 PLACE: E2.028 CHAIR: Rep. Garnet Coleman SB 1402 Rodríguez Relating to regulation by certain counties of lots in platted subdivisions that have remained undeveloped. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
